feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin dev list bounce

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin dev list bounce
entry.summary: Venzen Khaosan has sent a signed email to Warren, inquiring about the reason for his public apology message to Sergio Lerner bouncing back from the list. He had also sent the message to Sergio's personal email account but believes that a public apology would be more appropriate to set the record straight and in the interest of goodwill.The email is signed with a PGP signature.
